refnamediv.refpurpose: Returns the MaxDB client version as a string

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: The maxdb_get_client_info function is used to return a string representing the client version being used in the MaxDB extension.

refentry.refsect1:
&reftitle.returnvalues;
A string that represents the MaxDB client library version

refsect1.title: Example

example.title: maxdb_get_client_info
example.programlisting:
<?php

/* We don't need a connection to determine
   the version of MaxDB client library */

printf("Client library version: %s\n", maxdb_get_client_info());
?>
